title: Marutham
overview: Kanniyappan, A Hardworking Farmer, Is Devastated When He Learns That His Ancestral Farmland Has Been Auctioned Off Due To An Unpaid Loan. Despite Being A Diligent Farmer, Kanniyappan Is Shocked Because He Never Took Out Any Loan From A Bank Or Any Financial Institution. His Peaceful Life Takes A Dark Turn As He Begins To Unravel The Truth Behind This Mysterious Auction.
